meanings.sent1: The mages gathered to perform their magical tricks.
meanings.sent2: The town was amazed by the mages' ability to make things disappear.
meanings.sent3: The mages tried to pull a rabbit out of a hat, but instead, a duck appeared!
meanings.sent4: The mages' wands sparkled like shooting stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Children were mesmerized by the mages' colorful robes and mysterious smiles.

meanings.sent1: In the fantasy world, there were many mages with different powers.
meanings.sent2: The council was made up of wise mages who advised the king.
meanings.sent3: The mages argued over the best way to brew a potion, each claiming their method was superior.
meanings.sent4: The mages' library was a treasure trove of ancient knowledge and forgotten spells.
